body:
Finally! ParaView 5.10.0 final release is out :tada: :tada: :tada:

This PR updates the ParaView Spack package to use this new release and also set it as its preferred version.

Let me know if we need to change anything else in the package.

:tada: :tada: :tada:
title: ParaView: add new release ParaView v5.10.0
